channel.title: Products on Dkron - Distributed job scheduling system
channel.description: Recent content in Products on Dkron - Distributed job scheduling system

item.title: Dkron Pro
item.description: Dkron Pro Improved security, features and reliability for your scheduled jobs Buy Get additional features and commercial support from the creator of Dkron Key features Embedded storage When it comes to choosing a storage you could be making a wrong decision. Easy of use comes from having a well tested and supported storage. The embedded etcd storage is tuned for use with dkron out of the box.
